20101203200619.333|20101203200621.000|CCO|SPRING THAT THE U.S. CAN MAKE A

20101203200629.000|20101203200631.000|CCO|HE IS MAKING HEADWAY, BROOKE.
20101203200631.000|20101203200632.429|CCO|>> YOU MENTIONED THAT WAR
